alert.note: Alert for Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Red River (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 12:28AM CDT until September 25 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1227 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Stonewall, or 13 miles south of Shreveport, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mansfield, South Mansfield, Grand Cane, Gloster, Ninock, Carmel, Caspiana, Mc Dade, Kingston, Loggy Bayou, and Reeds Store. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Red River
